description:
Jakob Hauptmann was an Imperial captain who served as an agent of http://anidb.net/ch195 [Paul von Oberstein].
During the unrest on Odin, leading up to the Imperial Civil War, in 797 UC, Lt Commander Hauptmann took part in http://anidb.net/ch251 [Anton Ferner]`s attempt to assassinate http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm]. He later served the http://anidb.net/ch6230 [Lippstadt League] and, but worked aboard http://anidb.net/ch1760 [Geiersburg Fortress] as an informant for Oberstein and the other forces loyal to Lohengramm, helping incite uprisings among Lippstadt troops and getting Commodore http://anidb.net/ch757 [Ansbach] arrested.
Later, by 801 UC, Hauptmann had been promoted to captain and was serving the New Galactic Empire. That year, he took part in putting down a prison riot on Heinessen.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Jakob Hauptmann
